description.zh-CN: 结合日系可爱元素与现代极简设计理念的温柔美学。采用柔和的粉彩配色、圆润的边角、俏皮的动画效果和温暖的视觉语言，营造出友好、治愈的用户体验。适合创意工具、个人看板、生活方式应用等需要温馨氛围的场景。
description.en-US: A gentle aesthetic that combines Japanese kawaii elements with modern minimalist design principles. Features soft pastel colors, rounded corners, playful animations, and warm visual language to create a friendly and healing user experience. Ideal for creative tools, personal dashboards, lifestyle applications, and scenarios that require a warm atmosphere.
